title: Go with only professional driver
review: The roads are very much narrow and worst. Go with only professional driver. This place has very nice view of nainital.

title: Bar Road
review: Go only if your driver is experienced and  experienced at the hills driving as the road is very narrow and in very bad condition but once you reach there the view is excellent.

title: Can visit if not already booked a good place
review: Food was good, Other things are not well. Room was quite small. One thing i apprieatiate is the service they have provided.

title: Trekkers paradise
review: This Guano Hills is located in Pangot. Guano Hills are known for their amazing walking and trekking trails. The hills are surrounded by dense forests. The whole landscape is very scenic. For the adventure buffs, trekking beckons at the Guano Hills.

title: Hills Where You Can Enjoy
review: Located in the sleepy hamlet of pangot,the Guano hills are known for their amazing walking and trekking trails.The hills are surrounded by dense forests of Oak,Bamboo and deodar trees.Adventure buffs and nature enthusiast must visit this hill.

title: pangot
review: This Guano Hills is located in Pangot.. good landscape and scenic .. forests and trekking and walking trails

title: Wow!
review: This is really terrific. These hills are located in Pangot hamlet - a name most of the people would have not heard of; but the hills throw stupendously amazing walkking and trekking trails.

title: Good for trekkers but tiring journey
review: Not so popular place in nainital and that is the reason of it being not well maintained. Good for those who are fond of trekking but the approach road was terrific. However view from their was nice.

title: Out of the way hill station
review: Its a trekkers paradise, but take care of logistics before you arrive there. The countryside is filled with Himalayan flora.

title: Very terrible road
review: To reach this place is very much terrible. This place is just like Lands end. To reach here is very difficult task. The roads are very much narrow. Go with only professional driver. This place has very nice view of nainital.

title: Very nice place for peace
review: This is located in the outskirts of nainital and has a very nice view of the surroundings... Air is very fresh and clean and the views from the hills are majestic
